tool.name: Gene Activity

param.name: assay
param.label: Name of assay to use. If NULL, use the default assay.

param.name: extend_upstream
param.label: Number of bases to extend upstream of the TSS

param.name: extend_downstream
param.label: Number of bases to extend downstream of the TSS

param.name: biotypes
param.label: Gene biotypes to include. If NULL, use all biotypes in the gene annotation

param.name: max_width
param.label: Maximum allowed gene width for a gene to be quantified

tool.help: Compute counts per cell in gene body and promoter region.
